case.title: giving this a shot - 35 (London)
case.text: Please read.. if u dont put favorite color in subject line. I will delet due to spam... Hello.. I'm 35 Hispanic female.. i am looking for an ltr but want to take my time know the person. I work a lot so i dont ever have time to meet someone. I have my own place and vehicle. Please be able to make time for me as i would for u. Im not in to games or bs. Keep it real. No lies no cheating i dont have time for that. Kids are ok. I perfer my men hispanic or white, clean cut. Please have all ur own. Im not looking for one night stands or booty calls. I know how to cook.i keep my home clean. I recently started working out. And would like someone to go for walks with me. If u have questions please ask. In subject line please put favorite color. Please send pic. I will send one in return. Please no nude photos. I am d&d; free and expect u to be as well Hope to hear for u have a wonderful weekend.
